response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which we believe is worth every bit of its $1,000,000 value to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This is an extraordinary chance to secure such a valuable asset at a significant discount. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
